data.text: For this is what the LORD says:
For this is what the Lord GOD says:
And now what have I here?
Therefore My people will know My name;
Listen! Your watchmen lift up their voices,
Break forth in joy, sing together,
The LORD has bared His holy arm
Depart, depart, go out from there!
For you will not leave in a hurry
Behold, My Servant will prosper;52:13 Or will act wisely
Just as many were appalled at Him 52:14 Syriac; Hebrew at Youâ€”
so He will sprinkle 52:15 Or startle many nations.
